import numpy as np

import plotly.graph_objs as go
from plotly.offline import iplot
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

metal_cnt = df.METAL.value_counts()
print(metal_cnt)
data = [go.Bar(
    y = metal_cnt,
    x = metal_cnt.index)]
fig = go.Figure(data=data)
iplot(fig)
